title: A New Upscale Apt in Allen**Washer/Dryer Inc**
posting_body: A New Upscale and Stylish Apartment Community in Allen with Easy Access to 75, Minutes to 121, and I90!
Lots Of Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment Near By!
Enjoy the Luxury of Two-Color Scheme Options, Granite Countertops with Stainless Steel Appliances in the Kitchen.
Wood Floors, Walk-In Closets, Garden Tubs, with the Option Of Washer/Dryer Included or Connections in Your Apartment Home!

Amenities Include a Sparkling Resort Style Swimming Pool, Sun Deck Lounge, Outdoor Grilling, Cabanas, State of the Art Fitness Center, Yoga Studio, 5th Floor Roof Top Terrace, Club Room, and So Much More!
Elevator Access, Parking Garage, and Detached Garage Options As Well!
Please Call Jacquelyn with Dash Realty for More Information at
**12 Month Lease or Longer, No Corporate Leases, and No Sublease**
